name: There Are Twenty
description:
CAN YOU SURVIVE THE TWENTY?

Do you like puzzles? Do you like ... clones? Do you like puzzles with clones? Then you're in the right place!
There are online highscores - you must complete the game to submit your score! Best of luck :) 
WASD/Arrows to  move. Alt + Enter to toggle fullscreen.

GAMEPLAY

Absorb all squares and return to the portal to complete the level. Rinse and repeat. It'll make sense once you're playing.

DEVELOPMENT

Made in GMS2 in 48 hours for the GM20th birthday jam. I spent the first 5 days trying to make something from a coin based turn based rts idea that I really wanted to do. But it was boring. So I finally gave in and made this. Therefore it's not as polished as normal, but it should run fine - I didn't find any bugs in the 10 minutes of testing I did at the end. So, fingers crossed!

SOME LINKS

If you like it - follow me on twitter! I hardly use it but, maybe one day I will, and then we can be twitter friends. -> Twitter

If you enjoy - make sure to leave a comment and let me know if you have a game as well. I'll make sure to give it a play!
Thanks for playing :)
